member.name: T:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgAlignment
member.summary: Describes the position of the SVG from its parent canvas

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgAlignment.Start
member.summary: The SVG will be aligned at the start (left or top) of its canvas, if applicable

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgAlignment.Middle
member.summary: The SVG will be aligned at the middle of its canvas, if applicable

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgAlignment.End
member.summary: The SVG will be aligned at the end (right or bottom) of its canvas, if applicable

member.name: T:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgStretch
member.summary: Stretch options for a svg, relative to its parent

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgStretch.None
member.summary: Does not stretch the SVG

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgStretch.Uniform
member.summary: Uniform stretch as much as possible while keeping the SVG fully visible

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgStretch.UniformToFill
member.summary: Uniform stretch as much as possible until the parent is fully filled with the SVG. Some parts of the SVG will probably be hidden

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgStretch.Fill
member.summary: Stretch the SVG so it matches its parent width and height. The SVG will probably look distorted.

member.name: T:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView
member.summary: Control which displays a simple SVG image

member.name: P:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.ResourceIdsPrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the global prefix which will be added before every provided

member.name: P:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.MainPclAssembly
member.summary: Gets or sets the PCL assembly containing the SVGs to load If not set, it will use the application PCL assembly

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.ResourceIdProperty
member.summary: bindable property declaration

member.name: P:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.ResourceId
member.summary:
Gets or sets the path of the SVG resource file
The SVG file must be included in a projet as an EmbeddedResource (can be set via the files properties). Other modes, such as downloading a remote SVG, are not supported The resource id must be composed of alpha characters and dots only. It should not contain slashes.

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.StretchProperty
member.summary: property declaration

member.name: P:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.Stretch
member.summary: Gets or sets the SVG mode

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.HorizontalAligmentProperty
member.summary: property declaration

member.name: P:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.HorizontalAligment
member.summary: Gets or sets the SVG horizontal alignment

member.name: F:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.VerticalAligmentProperty
member.summary: property declaration

member.name: P:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.VerticalAligment
member.summary: Gets or sets the SVG Vertical alignment

member.name: M:XamaRed.Forms.Svg.SvgView.Init
member.summary: Does nothing, but might be useful to prevent dependencies removal
